verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> also <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> thee a <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> or <S%H1323>daughters<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> that are <S%H3209>born<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> their <S%H517>mothers<s%> that <S%H3205>bore<s%> them, and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> that <S%H3205>begot<s%> them in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%>

They shall <S%H4191>die<s%> of <S%H8463>grievous<s%> <S%H4463>deaths;<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H5594>lamented;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they be <S%H6912>buried;<s%> but they shall be as <S%H1828>dung<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth:<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3615>consumed<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and by <S%H7458>famine;<s%> and their <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> shall be <S%H3978>meat<s%> for the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and for the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H935>Enter<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4798>mourning,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H5594>lament<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> I have taken <S%H622>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and <S%H7356>mercies.<s%>

Both the <S%H1419>great<s%> and the <S%H6996>small<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land:<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H6912>buried,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall men <S%H5594>lament<s%> for them: <S%H3808>nor<s%> cut <S%H1413>themselves,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> make themselves <S%H7139>bald<s%> for them:

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall men <S%H6536>tear<s%> themselves for them <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H60>mourning,<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> them <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H4191>dead;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall men give them the <S%H3563>cup<s%> of <S%H8575>consolation<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> or <S%H5921>for<s%> their <S%H517>mother.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> also <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4960>feasting,<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them to <S%H398>eat<s%> and to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will cause to <S%H7673>cease<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and in your <S%H3117>days,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8342>mirth,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2860>bridegroom,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3618>bride.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> thou shalt <S%H5046>show<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> and they shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H5921>Wherefore<s%> <S%H4100><s%> hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us? or <S%H4100>what<s%> is our <S%H5771>iniquity?<s%> or <S%H4100>what<s%> is our <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> we have <S%H2398>committed<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God?<s%>

Then shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H5921>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and have <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and have <S%H5647>served<s%> them, and have <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> them, and have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H8451>law;<s%>

And <S%H859>ye<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7489>worse<s%> than your <S%H4480>fathers;<s%> <S%H1><s%> for, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> ye <S%H1980>walk<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> that they may <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me:

Therefore will I <S%H2904>cast<s%> you out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> ye <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> neither <S%H859>ye<s%> nor your <S%H1>fathers;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> shall ye <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night;<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>show<s%> you <S%H2594>favor.<s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that it shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>

But, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H776>lands<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he had <S%H5080>driven<s%> them: and I will bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> their <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1771>fishers,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and they shall <S%H1770>fish<s%> them; and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651><s%> will I <S%H7971>send<s%> for <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H6719>hunters,<s%> and they shall <S%H6679>hunt<s%> them <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1389>hill,<s%> and out of the <S%H4480>holes<s%> <S%H5357><s%> of the <S%H5553>rocks.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H1870>ways:<s%> they are <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5641>hid<s%> from my <S%H4480>face,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> is their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H6845>hid<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5048><s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And <S%H7223>first<s%> I will <S%H7999>recompense<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and their <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H4932>double;<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> they have <S%H2490>defiled<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H776>land,<s%> they have <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with the <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> of their <S%H8251>detestable<s%> and abominable <S%H8441>things.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> my <S%H5797>strength,<s%> and my <S%H4581>fortress,<s%> and my <S%H4498>refuge<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>affliction,<s%> the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee from the <S%H4480>ends<s%> <S%H657><s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H5157>inherited<s%> <S%H8267>lies,<s%> <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> and things wherein there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3276>profit.<s%>
Shall a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> unto himself, and <S%H1992>they<s%> are <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H430>gods?<s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H6471>once<s%> cause them to <S%H3045>know,<s%> I will cause them to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> and my <S%H1369>might;<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> is The <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
